backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and a public memories system with create, edit, and retrieval APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Structured report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for project verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose in the memory book, chat system, and UI hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell that mounts the React app into the root div and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling password/unlock workflow, welcome screen, memory filtering, and routing into full‑page chat mode.
frontend/src/components/ChatFullPage.tsx: Standalone full‑page chat UI with header, close button, and embedded ChatView wrapped in styled layout components.
frontend/src/components/ChatView.tsx: Renders the main chat interface with message display, sending, name handling, and delete (single/bulk) functionality.
frontend/src/components/ChatWidget.tsx: Provides a floating chat launcher that opens chat in a new tab and an optional in-page chat panel using ChatView.
frontend/src/components/MemoryEditDialog: Dialog for editing an existing memory with text, media upload/URL handling, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/components/MemoryFullscreen: Displays a memory in a full-screen dialog with metadata, media, access restrictions, and optional edit support.
frontend/src/components/MemoryList.tsx: Lists memories and renders each in a card with metadata, media previews, fullscreen view, and conditional editing.
frontend/src/components/MemorySubmitForm: Form for submitting new memories with text, author, optional media uploads or URLs, validation, and previewing.
frontend/src/components/MusicBoxWidget.t: Audio upload and playback widget allowing file validation, upload, and in-browser playback of stored songs.
frontend/src/components/PasswordGate.tsx: Username and 4‑digit code gate that validates input and calls an unlock handler.
frontend/src/components/VideoViewer.tsx: Dialog component that displays a video with error handling when the file cannot be loaded.
frontend/src/components/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page with welcome text, hero image, and buttons to continue or lock the app.
frontend/src/components/YouTubeLinksDial: Dialog for submitting and listing YouTube links with URL validation and backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook to create and manage a backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Chat hooks for fetching, submitting, and deleting messages via the backend with polling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatDisplayName.ts: Manages chat display name persisted in session and local storage with helpers to set and clear it.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMemories.ts: Fetches, sorts, and mutates memory entries via backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a username/password gate with session and local storage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting removal of Tingi search code.
frontend/src/hooks/useSongs.ts: Loads and sorts songs from the backend and handles uploading new songs using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useWelcomeGate.ts: Handles a dismissible welcome gate using session storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useYouTubeLinks.ts: Fetches, sorts, and submits YouTube links via backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom theming variables plus scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/audio.ts: Provides utilities for converting audio files to/from Uint8Array and generating data URLs.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable date or time strings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom color tokens, typography/container/animation plugins, and extended theme settings for layout, colors, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, feature set, architectural notes, and known issues for a memory-sharing site with chat, password gating, and media-upload features.
